content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    ServiceInfo2 as [Image Type]
    --,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    ,FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]   
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Tags
    ,ResourceId
    --,SubscriptionId
    --,SubscriptionName
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and Tags not like '%"Cluster%' and Tags not like '%"Kubernetes%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL --and SubscriptionId = '019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'
    --group by ServiceInfo2, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')
    group by ResourceId, ServiceInfo2, MeterSubCategory, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM'), Tags 
    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId), FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') DESC
    order by FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')
